name: Kenny Weathers
location: Cottonwood Cove, in the slave pen

topics.topic_text: Relax, this'll be over quickly. <Set off the explosive in his collar>
I've paid for your freedom. You're free to go.
topics.response_text: {Doesn't make sense}Why free me now? After what you done? I ain't saying thank you.
No way! I seen what happens when you mess with these collars!

topics.topic: VFreeformCottonwoodCoveNVCCKennyWeathersTopic005Hold still. <Deactivate the charge and remove his collar>
topics.topic_text: RF detonator? Give me a second.<Deactivate the charge and remove his collar>
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Hey, you did it! Nice work!

topics.topic_text: Never mind. I'll see if there is another way to free you.
topics.response_text: Good idea. I'd like to keep my head intact.
Sorry, I'm just glad someone is doing something. The last thing I need is to be made some legionaire's bitch and sent off to God knows where.

topics.topic_text: <Give Kenny the key from Canyon Runner>
topics.response_text: {Shocked disbelief}Freedom? Thank God Frank thinks we're enslaved.

topics.topic_text: I've paid for your freedom. You're free to go.
topics.response_text: {Shocked disbelief}Freedom? Thank God Frank thinks we're enslaved.

topics.topic_text: <Give Kenny the key from Canyon Runner>
topics.response_text: {Doesn't make sense}Why free me now? After what you done? I ain't saying thank you.

description:
Kenny Weathers is a 11 year-old Caucasian Male.

A young boy captured by Caesar's Legion and held in the slave pen at Cottonwood Cove in 2281. He's separated from his mother and sister who are also captives, while his father managed to escape during their capture.

Kenny Weathers's Personality: Fearful but resilient, Kenny has learned to be cautious and observant in his harsh environment. He clings to hope of reuniting with his father and family.

Kenny Weathers's Backstory: Kenny Weathers was born in the Mojave Wasteland to Frank and Martha Weathers. His father was a former NCR soldier who left the service after the First Battle of Hoover Dam, seeking a quieter life with his family. When Caesar's Legion began expanding their territory in the region, the Weathers family attempted to relocate to NCR-controlled territory. During their journey, they were ambushed and captured by Legion slavers. While his parents and sister were taken as slaves, Kenny's father managed to escape and is presumably searching for a way to rescue his family. Kenny, along with his mother and sister, was brought to Cottonwood Cove where he's now forced into labor in the slave pen.
